verbs.description: becarpet (third-person singular simple present becarpets, present participle becarpeting, simple past and past participle becarpeted)

entries.meaning: (transitive, poetic) To cover like a carpet.
examples: And outside was the garden, with its lemon-trees growing in vast jars-like the jars of Knossos—but marked with Barberini bees; its white and red camellias becarpeting the soft grass with their fallen petals;  […]
